params._bytecode: The executable bytecode of the TOFT contract.

executeTOFT(address,bytes,bool).details: Used to call derived OFT functions to a TOFT contract.

params._bytecode: The executable bytecode of the TOFT contract.
params._toft: The TOFT contract to execute against.

returns.result: The error message if the execution failed.

setMngmtFee(uint256).custom:invariant: Forbid a management fee higher than 0.5%.

params._mngmtFee: The new management fee for a wrap operation. In BPS.

TapiocaWrapper__AlreadyDeployed(address).notice: If the TOFT is already deployed.

TapiocaWrapper__FailedDeploy().notice: Failed to deploy the TapiocaWrapper contract.

TapiocaWrapper__MngmtFeeTooHigh().notice: The management fee is too high. Currently set to a max of 50 BPS or 0.5%.

TapiocaWrapper__NoTOFTDeployed().notice: No TOFT has been deployed yet.

CreateOFT(address,address).notice: Called when a new OFT is deployed.

createTOFT(address,bytes,bytes32).notice: Deploy a new TOFT contract. Callable only by the owner.

executeTOFT(address,bytes,bool).notice: Execute the `_bytecode` against the `_toft`. Callable only by the owner.

harvestFees().notice: Harvest fees from all the deployed TOFT contracts. Fees are transferred to the owner.

harvestableTapiocaOFTsLength().notice: Return the number of harvestable TOFT contracts deployed on the current chain.

lastTOFT().notice: Return the latest TOFT contract deployed on the current chain.

mngmtFee().notice: Management fee for a wrap operation. In BPS.

setMngmtFee(uint256).notice: Set the management fee for a wrap operation.

tapiocaOFTLength().notice: Return the number of TOFT contracts deployed on the current chain.

tapiocaOFTsByErc20(address).notice: Map of deployed TOFT contracts by ERC20.
